casebody.data:
MANNING, et al.
v.
COUNTY OF HALIFAX. No. 589PA04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2005. John W. O'Tuel, III, Raleigh, for The County of Halifax. Janet Dudley, for Manning, et al.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of February 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Five day extension Allowed per Order. Defendant (The County of Halifax) shall have up to and including the 14th day of March 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2005."
